badges.excerpt: Awarded for completing drills focused on finishing around the crease with finesse.

badges.excerpt: Awarded to attackmen who excel in fast-break situations, turning advantages into goals with precision and purpose. Your ability to punish opponents for their mistakes makes you a constant threat when the game opens up.
badges.congratulations_text: Congrats, Fast Break Finisher! When the defense is scrambling, you stay calm and collected, making every opportunity count. Your skillful finishes and sharp decision-making in fast-break situations keep the pressure on your opponents. Keep making them pay for their mistakes, and you'll always be the one to close the deal!

badges.congratulations_text: You've successfully earned the Ankle Breaker badge through your dynamic dodging! Keep refining your agility to remain unpredictable and continue breaking new boundaries!

badges.title: A9 - Rough Rider
badges.excerpt: Awarded to attackmen who show a fierce commitment to the defensive side of the game, tirelessly working to get the ball back and disrupt clears. Your effort and tenacity make you a threat all over the field, not just on offense.
badges.congratulations_text: Congrats, Rough Rider! Your hustle and grit on the ride set you apart, always fighting to get the ball back for your team. Keep up the pressure, and you'll be the first line of defense every time the other team tries to clear. Your work ethic is what makes you a true game-changer!

badges.congratulations_text: You've successfully earned the Island Isolator badge by dominating one-on-one battles coming up the hash! Continue to refine your isolating techniques and elevate your game to keep opponents stranded and outmatched.

badges.congratulations_text: As a newly crowned Goalie’s Nightmare, you've proven to be a formidable opponent that no one wants to face. You've sharpened your dodging and shooting to an ultimate level!

badges.congratulations_text: Your timing and teamwork on slides are on point. Keep honing those instincts, and practice recognizing slide opportunities even faster. Perfect slides win games, so keep supporting your teammates and locking down the defense!
